String.string: Shift + left-click on an item to open its tooltip.
You can link items into chat by holding [Ctrl] while left-clicking the item in your inventory.
You can mark points of interest on other players' world maps by using the chat and pressing Ctrl + left-click on the area.
You can cycle between chat channels using the left/right arrow keys on a blank active chat line.
Scroll back through your recent outbound chat using the up/down arrow keys while in the Chat window.
When you select "Group/Guild" Deathmatch in the menu, you can start fights with up to 20 people.
Party leaders can mark targets by hitting [Ctrl] + 1, 2, and 3.
Type /invite [character name] in the Chat window to invite a player into your party.
Clear the screen of UI by pressing [Ctrl] + [Z] for better screenshots.
You can change the size and color of your chat text by right-clicking on the Chat tab.
You can select another channel using the corresponding menu on the top right of the screen.
Hover your mouse over a party member's health bar to see where they are.
Your party members are highlighted on your maps even if you're on different world channels.
Your chat channel may change after using teleport scrolls, teleportals, or pegasus travel.
Instance Matching allows party members to continue questing or crafting right up until it's time to start the dungeon.
Press [Y] to open the Looking For Group dialog, or post from the Chat window by typing /lfg.
Dye Merchants in major cities help you change the color of your armor.
A single dye color will have different effects on differently-colored armor.
Hold [Ctrl] and right-click an icon to preview its appearance on your character.
When crafting, excellent work may create different items or extra materials.
You can view battleground entries from the past week under the "Record" menu option.
Joining parties lets you tackle bigger, tougher opponents and collect better gear, which lets you tackle bigger, tougher...
You can reset instances by typing '/reset' in chat window or using the "Reset Instances" button in your Profile (P).
You can adjust the maximum view distance of your camera via Options.
In a large battle, maximizing the distance of your camera via Options lets you can see all the battleground in one glance.
After reaching level 20, pressing [H] will open the Vanguard Requests.
Log in and complete Vanguard Initiative quests daily for rewards.
Your character can die from falling damage.
You can fast-travel to the capital Highwatch by pressing the "Go to Reputation Shop" button in Vanguard Requests (H).
You can turn on/off "Display monster attacks" and other useful options under Options (O).
If your brooch has an active skill, you can drag it into a shortcut slot to use the skill.
You can restore your companion's stamina using a Popori Figurine or similar gift item.
Vanguard Requests reset every morning at 7 AM.
You can use "Shift + Right-Click" to select multiple items at once in the shop and when dismantling.
Press "ESC" to skip the video.
You can choose to automatically skip videos you have already seen at "Options > Game > Auto-skip".
Type /? to view the chat command help menu.
You can reply to whispers by pressing the [R] key.
Press [Y] to see other players looking to form parties.
Enhancement crystals are delicate and may shatter when you die.
Clerics of Restoration can help you recover HP.
Solo players can type /invite [Joe] to apply to join Joe's party.
Type /join [Jane] to apply to join [Jane]'s party.
The Looking for Group window lets you state a goal so the whole party knows the plan.
To be tougher in a fight, attach enhancement crystals to empty slots in your armor, weapon, rings, and earrings.
Can't move your character? Click Unstuck on the System menu to teleport to the nearest town.
Skilled players and polite players are chosen for parties over others.
Type /goal to update your party's goal in the Looking for Group window.
Quests with red exclamation marks are essential to the game's storyline.
To mark a monster's location on the Map, click on its name in the quest or in your Quest Log.
Fighting Big-Ass Monsters in a party speeds your way to rewards.
Before you can teleport to a camp, you must first visit the camp yourself.
Balanced parties of a tank, a healer, and three damage dealers make short work of any opponent.
The healer in your party can summon party members together.
When multiple party members gather from one source, it yields more resources.
Party members can mark monsters by using the [Q] key.
Some merchants sell crystals for armor, weapons, and accessories.
The color of a quest's name in your Quest Log indicates its difficulty for your character.
When a skill icon appears next to your crosshairs during combat, hit the space bar to instantly fire the "chained" skill.
Party Leaders can set party loot to round robin distribution for equal distribution of supplies.
Crafted equipment can be attuned for enchantment. They gain new abilities as you enchant them.
A monster's eyes will often glint before a powerful attack.
Want to enchant equipment? Open the Activity menu and click Enchant.
Use feedstock and alkahest of the same tier to enchant an item. You can get alkahest from a shop.
When the Help button appears onscreen, press the [H] key to view a gameplay tip.
Most instanced dungeons are much easier to clear in a party.
In UI mode, right-click players to invite them into a party, challenge them to duels, etc.
A pegasus will carry you between villages or cities...for a fee.
Every race has a few skills all its own.
Teleport scrolls are the fastest, easiest way to reach distant cities, but pricey.
Change your shortcut keys by pressing [O] for the Options dialog.
You can create a guild through the guild manager in any major city. You have to be Level 8 or higher. Bring one other party member and {@money:3000}.
Use charms while recharging at a campfire. Others near the fire also gain the benefits.
You can send gold and items to other players through parcel post.
Remove a crystal from its socket by right-clicking on it.
Inventory Managers can expand your inventory for a fee.
Add quests to your onscreen Quest Tracker by checking the box by their name in your Quest Log [L].
Well-prepared parties collect gathering buffs and burn charms before entering dungeons.
Enchant items by clicking Enchant on the Activities menu.
A level 11 quest gives you access to a mount.
Some potions can't be purchased through merchants.
Higher-level priests and mystics can teleport party members to their side.
Apply to, check on, or praise a guild through the Guilds on Server list on your Social Menu.
Hold [Q] and left-click a monster to add a readout of its name and health to your UI.
Too busy to chat in combat? Hold [E] to choose a combat exclamation.
To rapid-fire your primary attack, just hold down the attack button.
Want to dance? Type /dance in chat.
When someone waves to you, wave back by typing /wave in chat.
Instance Matching checks for undergeared party members. You can too by typing /inspect [CharacterName].
The red door button under your compass leads you to Instance Matching with your party.
Some monsters don't come alone.
Click the middle mouse button to reset your camera angle.
Having a tank to keep the enemy's aggro makes every party member's job easier.
You can expand your Skills Tray to show more buttons with the Expand/Minimize Tray button.
You can have up to 9 different skill layouts per character. Press [Alt] and 1-9 to hot-switch between them.
Press the [BACK] button on your controller to open the Controller Configuration dialog.
Your controller's left and right bumper buttons are combo keys. Using them, every button on your controller can fire up to 4 skills.
Customize the messages on your quick-chat menu on the Game tab of your Options dialog.
Named weapons can have unique properties.
Enigmatic scrolls have a chance to create a masterwork item.
Enchantment bonuses can be changed with an Enigmatic Scroll.
Intricate enigmas may already obscure masterwork items.
Masterwork equipment can be enchanted to +12.
Bookmark your favorite crafting recipes by clicking the star to the left of their names in the Crafting dialog.
When remodeling gear, the item you use as a visual template will be destroyed.
Weapons enchanted higher than +7 appear with a visible glow.
Auto-enter a search term in the Brokerage by [Ctrl]-left clicking an item in your inventory.
Right-click the purchased recipe to obtain the craft skill.
Right-click the purchased glyph in your inventory to see it on the glyph list.
Use teleport platforms in Val Oriyn to move around faster.
In Val Oriyn, characters receive rested XP when logged out in Highwatch, any camp, or at teleport platforms.
There are teleportals in the camps of Val Oriyn. Use them to reach any camp you've already visited.
There is a teleportal from Highwatch to Velika. You will have to unlock it through the mission quests.
Sanctuaries with beneficial effects sometimes appear in Val Oriyn.
Powerful BAMs are dwelling in the lands of Val Oriyn.

Attained 'Riding Skill: Bay Gelding'.
Open inventory and right-click on a skill book to learn the skill.
The Mysterium is a large organization whose secretive leaders are mostly high elves.
Velik is quite proud of her adopted human children and the federation they helped to found.
Mysterium agents comb the world to uncover lost secrets—but for what purpose?
Popori ambushers can wait in trees for weeks, leading some enemies to wonder if they grow there like fruit.
Castanic costumes are popular for parties. Artisans make exquisite replica horns...for a price.
The whole Popori Kingdom gathers by the Lake of Tears for festivals and holidays.
Rare ores dot the hellish landscape of Fyrmount. Castanic smiths covet the metal they provide.
The amani favor big game hunting. And when they say big, they mean BIG.
Crafting and Enchanting are two skills most high elves learn early in life.
High elves have no monarchs or hereditary ruling class. Every decision is the product of subtle—and sometimes sinister—politics.
Elven families are responsible for their children's education, which includes extensive study of genealogy and ancestral history.
Through their long exile, humans have become natural explorers, adventurers, and trailblazers.
Amani fight for many reasons: for exercise, for sport, for conquest, and for survival.
Amani revere the struggles of their ancestors, long enslaved by the now-extinct empire of the giants.
Kaiator's forges and smithies are the world's most productive, serving as the engine of the Valkyon Federation's war effort.
The Scions of Lok work tirelessly to bring the long-departed god Lok back into the world. Their intrigues cover Arun like a web of shadows.
If you can't find it in Velika, it's either illegal or toxic. For those things, shop in Castanica.
The baraka are a mystery to other federation races and the focus of curiosity wherever they go.
The Mysterium studies all manner of creatures. Occasionally, there are setbacks.
Several races make up the Popori Kingdom. But their queen is always a waif-like elin.
Castanics are a matriarchal society for the most part. Males often seek their fortune elsewhere, but always have a place in the clan.
Thrill-seeking castanics are inveterate gamblers. They're also incredibly lucky.
Amani proverb: beware the food next to a popori who eats very little.
The primitive tuwangis obsess over frogs. For a tuwangi, the frog is food, pet, steed, clothing, and even building material.
Slow-cooked pigling is an amani delicacy. They roast the meat in pits—a vestige of their past as slaves when they had to hide such food from their cruel masters.
Castanic artisans meld skill and magic to create fantastic artifacts. In the past, even the gods sought castanic craftsmanship.
The magic of the elves powers a marvelous city in the middle of Shara's desert.
Humans flocked to central Arun to build the city of Velika, which rapidly became a worldwide trading hub.
The baraka are known for their love of knowledge, and also for their propensity for getting lost in a good book.
The amani sport of "huumka" has one simple rule: stay inside the circle!
Take the reins! Run for a Valkyon Federation Vanarch's office and win honor and power.
Vanarchs are regularly elected on each server. Apply to run at any major city's Election Registrar.
Some Vanarch seats are decided by popular vote, some by personal combat.
In elections, you vote for one candidate per continent through the voting icon by your Compass.
Each winning Vanarch will be assigned one province, setting policies and profiting from local taxes.
Vanarchs can make special announcements and collect taxes. The Vanarch's guild members ride special mounts.
Go to Priest Ahdun.
The expedition to the Island of Dawn is in trouble! (Prologue)
You can move by using the [W][A][S][D] keys.
You can move by using ,,,.
You can move by using ,,,.
Press [F] to talk to Ahdun.
Press to talk to Ahdun.
Press to talk to Ahdun.
Go to Quartermaster Popomin for better gear.
New gear will show up in your Inventory [I]. Right-click [MR] to equip.
New gear will show up in your Inventory . Press , , to equip.
New gear will show up in your Inventory . Press , , to equip.
Report to Deputy Commander Akrak.
Enter the cave.
Press [SPACE] to jump.
Press to jump.
Press to jump.
Press [NUMLOCK] to run automatically.
Press to run automatically.
Press to run automatically.
Press [ALT] to switch to UI mode. In UI mode, you can use the pointer.
Press to switch to UI mode. In UI mode, you can use the pointer.
Press to switch to UI mode. In UI mode, you can use the pointer.
You'll enter combat soon. Read about the skills in your toolbar before you proceed.
Press [ALT], then mouse over the icons in your toolbar to learn what each skill does.
Press , then move the pointer [MO] {MO} over the icons in your toolbar to learn what each skill does.
Press , then move the pointer [MO] {MO} over the icons in your toolbar to learn what each skill does.
Press [F] to start climbing, then use your movement keys to ascend.
Press to start climbing.
Press to start climbing.
"Our journey to salvation was to begin on the Island of Dawn. Instead it began with destruction." —Elleon
The bridge has collapsed! You'll have to swim.
Advance forward. You must find Elleon!
Advance forward.
Troops from the expedition will fight by your side.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then left-click [ML] to attack.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then press to attack.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then press to attack.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then use Fireball [ML] to attack.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then use Fireball to attack.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then use Fireball to attack.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then use Divine Radiance [ML] to attack.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then use Divine Radiance to attack.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then use Divine Radiance to attack.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then use Sharan Bolt [ML] to attack.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then use Sharan Bolt to attack.
Target the enemy in the center of the screen, then use Sharan Bolt to attack.
Assault Stance [F2] helps you attack.
Assault Stance + helps you attack.
Assault Stance + helps you attack.
Defensive Stance [F3] helps protect you.
Defensive Stance + helps protect you.
Defensive Stance + helps protect you.
When the enemy flashes red, a powerful attack is on the way. Right-click [MR] to block.
When the enemy flashes red, a powerful attack is on the way. Press to block.
When the enemy flashes red, a powerful attack is on the way. Press to block.
Attacks launched after the enemy flashes red are very powerful. Right-click [MR] to dodge.
Attacks launched after the enemy flashes red are very powerful. Press to dodge.
Attacks launched after the enemy flashes red are very powerful. Press to dodge.
Help Elleon.
Help Elleon.
Help Elleon.
Destroy the blockade, and advance with your new allies.
Destroy the blockade, and advance with your new allies.
Destroy the blockade, and advance with your new allies.
You must cooperate with your allies to survive.
You must cooperate with your allies to survive.
You must cooperate with your allies to survive.

The monster is enraged! It now moves and attacks even faster.
The monster is enraged! It now moves and attacks even faster.

The monster is fatigued. Focus your attacks now!
The monster is fatigued. Focus your attacks now!

Shield Barrage can be used twice in a row.

Charging Lunge [4] sends you rushing toward the enemy.
Charging Lunge + sends you rushing toward the enemy.
Charging Lunge + sends you rushing toward the enemy.
Challenging Shout [F1] attracts a nearby enemy's attention. Use it when an ally is in peril.
Challenging Shout + attracts a nearby enemy's attention. Use it when an ally is in peril.
Challenging Shout + attracts a nearby enemy's attention. Use it when an ally is in peril.

Assault Stance + helps you attack, but reduces your defenses.

Rising Fury + can be used three times in a row.

Rapid Fire shoots a burst of arrows while you hold [4] down.
Rapid Fire shoots a burst of arrows while you hold + down.
Rapid Fire shoots a burst of arrows while you hold + down.
Radiant Arrow [3] launches a powerful attack against a single enemy.
Radiant Arrow + launches a powerful attack against a single enemy.
Radiant Arrow + launches a powerful attack against a single enemy.
Arrow Volley [1] and Penetrating Arrow [2] are effective against multiple enemies.
Arrow Volley and Penetrating Arrow + are effective against multiple enemies.
Arrow Volley and Penetrating Arrow + are effective against multiple enemies.
Shocking Implosion [1] and Final Reprisal [3] attack nearby enemies.
Shocking Implosion and Final Reprisal + attack nearby enemies.
Shocking Implosion and Final Reprisal + attack nearby enemies.
Triple Nemesis [2] and Metamorphic Blast [4] attack enemies far away.
Triple Nemesis + and Metamorphic Blast + attack enemies far away.
Triple Nemesis + and Metamorphic Blast + attack enemies far away.
Triple Nemesis [2] can be used three times in a row.
Triple Nemesis + can be used three times in a row.
Triple Nemesis + can be used three times in a row.
Final Reprisal [3] engages immediately if used right after Shocking Implosion [1] or Triple Nemesis [2].
Final Reprisal + engages immediately if used right after Shocking Implosion or Triple Nemesis +
Final Reprisal + engages immediately if used right after Shocking Implosion or Triple Nemesis +
Purifying Circle [F1] cleanses effects on you and others. Regeneration Circle [F2] heals nearby party members.
Purifying Circle + cleanses effects on you and others. Regeneration Circle + heals nearby party members.
Purifying Circle + cleanses effects on you and others. Regeneration Circle + heals nearby party members.
Heal Thyself [TAB] heals you instantly.
Heal Thyself heals you instantly.
Heal Thyself heals you instantly.
Restorative Burst [F3] heals allies faster, but in a smaller area.
Restorative Burst + heals allies faster, but in a smaller area.
Restorative Burst + heals allies faster, but in a smaller area.
You can't summon multiple thralls simultaneously.
You can't summon multiple thralls simultaneously.
You can't summon multiple thralls simultaneously.
Summon a Thrall of Protection [F1] to protect you while using heavy damage spells.
Summon a Thrall of Protection + to protect you while using heavy damage spells.
Summon a Thrall of Protection + to protect you while using heavy damage spells.
Use Arun's Vitae [5] to heal yourself or someone nearby.
Use Arun's Vitae + to heal yourself or someone nearby.
Use Arun's Vitae + to heal yourself or someone nearby.
Press [F] after dropping Arun's Vitae [5] to use the healing mote.
Press after dropping Arun's Vitae + to use the healing mote.
Press after dropping Arun's Vitae + to use the healing mote.
Use Expedition Healing Potion [F5].
Use Expedition Healing Potion +
Use Expedition Healing Potion +
Use Expedition Mana Potion [F6].
Use Expedition Mana Potion +
Use Expedition Mana Potion +
Up to 5 players can ride the airship simultaneously.
Repair destroyed siege weapons by using the [F] key.
To board airships and siege weapons, press the [F] key.
Sides will switch roles on round two. The fastest team to destroy the anchorstone wins.
Destroyed airships will respawn after few minutes.
Turret siege weapons are more powerful than mobile ones.
When you capture resurrection locations, you can choose to resurrect closer to the battle.
You can capture a resurrection location by using the [F] key.
When an airship or siege weapon is destroyed, any player inside will die.
Round two will last exactly as long as round one.
Players' gear changes to exclusive equalized gear upon entry to Corsairs' Stronghold.
Only equipped gear is replaced. Any empty equipment slots when you enter the battleground stay empty.
The more you contribute in the battleground, the more rewards you will receive.
All characters automatically adjust to level 65 in this battleground.
Only defenders can board Castle Airship.
You cannot ride cannons or mounts when you are a suicide bomber.
Gather the bombs around each points to become a suicide bomber.
You can use chat ban function at battlegrounds where you have more than 5 members in your team.
To win, the federation players must locate, gather, and carry kumas rock candy to the loading dock.
Kumas players slow down as their HP drops.
Federation players slow down and are unable to use skills while carrying rock candy.
Beware: Some kumas skills have a chance of resetting their cooldown times.
The kumas curse Spanked! cannot be removed.
Federation players must destroy treasure chests to find rock candy.
The treasure chests contain other items besides rock candy.
If a federation player is killed while carrying rock candy, the rock candy goes to the kumas who killed the federation player.
If a kumas player is killed while carrying rock candy, the rock candy is dropped on the ground, and federation players may pick it up.
Some kumas skills have a low-probability chance of resetting their cooldown times.
Only federation team can use chat ban in Kumasylum.
In Fraywind Canyon, you win if you earn more scores than the opponent by seizing pyres.
Neutral monsters will appear at every set time, and beneficial effect for your team will apply on defeating them.
Buff is offered if your team has significantly lower score and less kill number when the score reaches 2,000.
Maximum three allies can seize a pyre.
Use leader exclusive skills to lead the battle to your team's advantage.
You can use chat ban function at battlegrounds where you have more than 5 members in your team.
Players receive equalized gear in the Iron Battleground.
Empty equipment slots will not be filled upon entry: Check your character profile [P] and make sure you're wearing a complete set of gear.
Board tanks and cannons by pressing [F].
When your tank is destroyed, run for cover to avoid damage.
Players are temporarily leveled to 65 for this battleground.
Players receive equalized gear in the Iron Battleground.
Empty equipment slots will not be filled upon entry: Check your character profile [P] and make sure you're wearing a complete set of gear before queueing.
If the Ultimate Tank or Artillery are destroyed with a player aboard, the player dies as well.
If a Napalm Tank, Power Tank, or Speed Tank are destroyed with a player aboard, the player automatically escapes.
The Napalm Tank can also place mines.
The Power Tank has strong attack and defense capabilities.
The Speed Tank has high Movement Speed and a quick attack.
The Artillery's Air Strike has a wide attack range.
Dominate the Ultimate Tank, and you will dominate the battleground.
Ram a Repair Pylon to heal a damaged tank.
Once you board a Napalm, Power, or Speed Tank, you cannot get out until it's destroyed.
If a Napalm, Power, or Speed Tank gets destroyed, you have to make your way on foot.
Hide in the bushes when your tank gets destroyed.
The Napalm Tank can also place mines.
The Power Tank has strong attack and defense capabilities.
The Speed Tank has a high Movement Speed, and a quick attack.
New consumables show up in your Inventory [I]. Right-click to use.
New consumables show up in your Inventory . Press , , to use.
New consumables show up in your Inventory . Press , , to use.
You've acquired the skill Grim Strike.
You've acquired the skill Pendulum Strike.
You've acquired the skill Whipsaw.
You've acquired the skill Sundering Strike.
You've acquired the skill Cable Step.
You've acquired the skill Death Spiral.
You've acquired the skill Shadow Burst.
You've acquired the skill Smite.
Automatically added to Skills window [K]. Drag to your shortcuts by using your mouse.
Use Retaliate to jump up and attack the basilisk.
You're low on HP. Use Whipsaw.
Use Cable Step on the wooden fence. Cable Step throws your scythes up to 18 meters.
In the Gridiron, your respawn area is randomly chosen.
Some respawn areas are unreachable through normal means.
Players receive equalized PvP gear in the Gridiron.
The Gridiron is a team exercise—but individual rankings determine rewards!
When the Battlegrounds Info UI is open, you can scroll through the current rankings on the Team List.
You can gain power effects from monoliths in the Gridiron.
Kill enemies and win first place on the team!
If you use Rolling Reload on the ({MR} button), you can use Scattershot again.
Press [MR] button to use Rolling Reload to reset the cooldown for Scattershot .
Press {MR} button to Counter an enemy's attack while <font color = '#FF0000'>defending yourself</font> from attacks.
Hold {MR} button to use Counter to <font color = '#FF0000'>maintain your defense</font>.
While using Bull Rush, you can change direction with the mouse.
When using Rampage, you can both attack and defend.
When using Ground Pounder, you can attack and defend.
Leaping Slash generates a Runemark on your target.
Runemarks can be used to deal great damage by using Runeburst.
<font color = '#FF0000'>Critical hits</font> on normal monsters can also generate<font color = '#FFE400'>Runemarks</font>.
Runeburst deals more damage depending on the number of Runemarks a target bears.
You can generate up to seven <font color = '#FFE400'>Runemarks</font>.
<font color = '#FFE400'>Runemarks</font> can be transferred to your next target within 15 seconds after the first target dies.
All party members must use a Battle Solution. This item is sold by the Dungeon Merchant.
All party members must use a Battle Solution. This item is sold by the Dungeon Merchant.
<font color = '#FFFF00'>All party members have used a Battle Solution!</font>
When attacking Vergos's legs, each hit is counted as an attack from behind. Use Bitter crystals.
When attacking Vergos's legs, each hit is counted as an attack from behind. Use Bitter crystals.
When attacking Vergos's legs, each hit is counted as an attack from behind. Use Bitter crystals.
After collecting 5 Air Essences or Fire Essences, you can approach a desertwight of the opposite type and{ML} select to kill it.
After collecting 5 Wind Essences or Fire Essences, you can fire the collected essences at the Desert Greatwight{ML} by selecting it.
<font color='#ffff00'>In vicinity of an alien scout</font>, select {ML} to attack it. Attacking will cost <font color='#ff0000'>Flight Gauge</font>.

Recover Flight Duration by collecting a dropped spark from alien scouts, or by absorbing spark of a spark generator by {ML} selecting it.. Collect 10
sparks to gain a bonus effect!
<font color='#ffff00'>In vicinity of the alien mothership</font>, select {ML} to attack it. Attacking will cost <font color='#ff0000'>Flight Gauge</font>.

Recover Flight Duration by collecting a dropped spark from the alien mothership, or by absorbing spark of a spark generator by {ML} selecting it.. Collect 10
sparks to gain a bonus effect!
Activate the bait by {MR} and go to the fishery to fish with a fishing rod.
<font color='#ffff00'>Laser rotates</font> when incapacitation device is activated. Laser incapacitates <font color='#ffff00'>butterflies of the same color</font>.

You have a Delicate Green Aroma.
Use the flower explosion to change your effect to a
Delicate Violet Aroma or to match colors with the outer fog.

You have a Delicate Violet Aroma.
Use the flower explosion to change your effect to a
Delicate Green Aroma or to match colors with the outer fog.

You have been caught by four Orcan Guards.
Lead the guards to the next entrance and kill them all at once to quickly go to the next area.

Statue's Gaze has been activated.
Apply the Gaze effect to Nightmare Ptakum.

Be aware of Nightmare Ptakum's actions.

The Crimson Statue is gazing at you.
Nightmare Ptakum will target you after yelling [I will break you!]. Turn your back on the Crimson Statue and evade Nightmare Ptakum's attack. After successfully evading the attack, destroy the Crimson Statue to deactivate its gaze.

The Radiant Statue is gazing at you.
Nightmare Ptakum will target you after yelling [I will break you!]. Turn your back on the Radiant Statue and evade Nightmare Ptakum's attack. After successfully evading the attack, destroy the Radiant Statue to deactivate its gaze.

The Cursed Statue is gazing at you.
Nightmare Ptakum will target you after yelling [I will break you!]. Turn your back on the Cursed Statue and evade Nightmare Ptakum's attack. After successfully evading the attack, destroy the Cursed Statue to deactivate its gaze.

If you did not apply a gaze to Nightmare Ptakum, you must brace yourself for a <font color='#ffffff'>Powerful Attack</font>. Gazed characters <font color='#ffffff'>cannot move so you must receive help from your group members</font>.

Nightmare Kylos has awakened. Nightmare Kylos discharged electricity during certain attacks. Keep an eye on the Lightning Aura Charge effect's stack. When Lightning Aura Charge reaches 4 stacks, Nightmare Kylos casts a powerful area attack which can be evaded or ignored with damage immunity.

When Nightmare Kylos's HP reaches 30%, Lightning Aura Charge will stack 3 times and Nightmare Kylos will discharge electricity every 2 attacks.

Watch out for falling stones.

Locate the stones and get hit. This will draw lightning and destroy the stone.

Stones will summon at a farther range during the actual dungeon. If 2 stones fall, split into 2 groups of 4 and 1.

Nightmare Kylos prepares a semicircular strike. The attack strikes a random target in the direction Nightmare Kylos is <font color='#ffffff'>facing</font>. The semicircular strike <font color='#ffffff'>cannot be evaded or ignored with damage immunity</font>. Nightmare Kylos casts a pulsewave attack at the same time. Pulsewave attack can be evaded so go to a safe place to hide. 1 to 3 self-destructing electric orbs appear after the attack. Destroy the orbs within 5 seconds.

Dungeon Role Guide

Tank
When encountering a boss quickly approach and use Unwavering orInfuriate to pull aggro. Use skills that decrease the target's endurance and buff DPS characters while maintaining aggro. Use party buff skills when bosses are enraged.

Prime Battle Solutions, Bravery Potions, and Noctenium Infusions are essential items.
Battle Dishes and Noctenium Elixirs will greatly aid your battle.
These items can be purchased from the Training Dungeon Merchant.

Dungeon Role Guide

DPS
When the tank character pulls aggro, buff yourself and chain your attack skills. Use powerful skills with long cooldowns when bosses are enraged.

Prime Battle Solution, Bravery Potion, and Noctenium Infusion are essential items.
Battle Dishes and Noctenium Elixirs will greatly aid your battle.
These items can be purchased from the Training Dungeon Merchant.

Dungeon Role Guide

Healer
Buff the party before a fight. When your party encounters a boss support your party with endurance decreasing skills. Use purification, heal, or regression when needed. Reapply buffs when bosses are enraged.

Prime Battle Solutions, Bravery Potions, and Noctenium Infusions are essential items.
Battle Dishes and Noctenium Elixirs will greatly aid your battle.
These items can be purchased from the Training Dungeon Merchant.

Nightmare Nedra Core Pattern

During the battle, a green or violet fog will appear in the outer area.
You will be surrounded by a Delicate Green Aroma or Delicate Violet Aroma when the fog appears.
You can change the effect from green or violet by taking explosion damage from a red flower or a golden flower. After you change the effect to or , your character will die instantly if the color of the effect does not match the color of the fog.
1 or 2 red flowers will spawn randomly.
1 golden flower spawns and will explode after time or when destroyed.


This guide will disappear in 30 seconds or when the battle starts.

Nightmare Ptakum Core Pattern

Remember the positions of the Crimson Statue, Radiant Statue, and Cursed Statue. Each statue's gaze wstretches from the inner circle or outer area of the statue.

You must evade Nightmare Ptakum's attack and lure him into position to take damage from the gaze.

When Nightmare Ptakum lifts its arms up and strikes down, the attack is a melee explosion. When turning around, the attack is a ranged knockback explosion. Keep an eye on Nightmare Ptakum and evade or trigger damage immunity for the attack.
Two statues will activate at once when Nightmare Ptakum's HP reaches 50%.


This guide will disappear in 30 seconds or when the battle starts.

Nightmare Kylos Core Pattern

Nightmare Kylos often attacks the rear with its tail and wing. When slamming the rear with its tail, Nightmare Kylos casts a powerful melee-mid-range attack that reduces HP by 50% that cannot be evaded or ignored with damage immunity. Nightmare Kylos attacks the same spot where it slammed its tail.

Nightmare Kylos summons stones after a while. The stones explode, and after taking damage from a stone your HP decreases to 1 and you cannot recover HP. Your party must work together to chain a lightning strike and destroy the stone.

Also, after targeting a random character, Nightmare Kylos attacks in the direction it is facing. After the semicircular attack, electric orbs appear. You must destroy the orbs.

When reaching 80% and 30% HP, Nightmare Kylos awakens and casts a deadly attack. You must evade or ignore the attack with damage immunity.

This guide will disappear in 30 seconds or when the battle starts.

Nightmare Ghergof Core Pattern (maintained for 30 seconds)

1. Ice Area Attack
Randomly attacks a target with an ice area attack.
- You are frozen and HP decreases as time passes. Invincible for a short time.

2. melee/range or range/melee attack
Attacks in the order of melee/range or range/melee.

3. Area attack + melee/range or range/melee
Attacks in order of melee/range or range/melee after an area attack.
- Casts when HP is 60% or lower

4. Airbone + breath (random) attack
Airbones targets and attacks with breath after saying Your flesh will be deleted! (attacks 2 times)
- Airbone attack can be evaded.
- Target of breath attack can evade the attack for a while when going to the ice area.

Nightmare Ghergof Core Pattern (maintained for 30 seconds)

1. Individual area attack (all players) + range attack
Attacks all players with an individual area attack followed by a range attack.

2. Turn around attack + right hand scratch + area attack
Attacks in an order of turning around and a scratch attack, followed by a area attack.
- Casts when HP is 50% or lower.

3. Left hand attack + right hand attack + scratch attack + area attack
Attacks with left and right hand followed by a left or right hand scratch attack and area attack.
- Casts an
additional scratch attack when HP is 50% or lower.

4. Curse debuff attack
Attacks with a range attack (blue) or melee attack (red) after saying Sacrificial target selected.
- Cursed when taking damage
- If no one takes damage, a
all members are cursed from a full area attack
- Character dies on 2 stacks
- Resurrected players receive a instant death buff when cursed

Curse debuff attack
Attacks with a range attack (blue) or melee attack (red) after saying
Sacrificial target selected.
- Cursed when taking damage
- If no one takes damage, a
all members are cursed from a full area attack
- Character dies on 2 stacks
- Resurrected players receive a instant death buff when cursed
- Casts
2 times when Nightmare Kalioth's HP is 20% or lower

Nightmare Antaroth Core Pattern (maintained for 30 seconds)

1. Prison attack
Casts a full area prison attack after saying Escape option disabled..
Additional prisons are spawned when taking damage from the prison.
- Can escape by destroying the prisons.

2. Sphere attack
Players receive a sphere debuff and a symbol appears on the ground after Antaroth says Enter your final words now. Spheres are spawned at the outer area.
Players must destroy a sphere that has the opposite color with the granted debuff before the symbol is complete. Players will die instantly if sphere is not destroyed.
- Players can evade instant death by destroying the correct sphere.

3. Trapping attack
A trapping area attack is casted nearby Antaroth after saying Have a glimpse of despair!
Players must step on the same color with the granted debuff and destroy Antaroth's barrier to stop annihilation.
- Casts when HP is 40% or lower.
- Note that HP decreases even when stepping on area.

Sphere attack

Players receive a sphere debuff and a symbol appears on the ground after Antaroth says Enter your final words now. Spheres are spawned at the outer area.
Players must destroy a sphere that has the opposite color with the granted debuff before the symbol is complete. Players will die instantly if sphere is not destroyed.
- Players can evade instant death by destroying the correct sphere.

Prison attack

Casts a full area imprisoning attack after saying
Escape option disabled..
Additional prisons are spawned when taking damage from the prison.
- Can escape by destroying the prisons.

Trapping attack

Antaroth casts a trapping area attack after saying Have a glimpse of despair!
Players must step on the same color floor area as their applied debuff and destroy Antaroth's barrier to stop annihilation.
- Casts when HP is 40% or lower.
- Note that HP decreases even when stepping on area.

Avatar attack

Antaroth creates two avatars after saying Patience not found.
- Antaroth casts a focus or spiral attack.
- Casts when 50% HP or below.

Tank
When encountering a boss quickly approach and use Unwavering orInfuriate to pull aggro. Use skills that decrease the target's endurance and buff DPS characters while maintaining aggro. Use party buff skills when bosses are enraged.

Prime Battle Solutions, Bravery Potions, and Noctenium Infusions are essential items.
Battle Dishes and Noctenium Elixirs will greatly aid your battle.
These items can be purchased from the Training Dungeon Merchant.

Dungeon Role Guide

Healer
Buff the party before a fight. When your party encounters a boss support your party with endurance decreasing skills. Use purification, heal, or regression when needed. Reapply buffs when bosses are enraged.

Prime Battle Solutions, Bravery Potions, and Noctenium Infusions are essential items.
Battle Dishes and Noctenium Elixirs will greatly aid your battle.
These items can be purchased from the Training Dungeon Merchant.

Akalath Travan's Core Pattern

Travan constantly casts Crimson Curse or Blue Curse through close or long-range attacks.
Caution Travan's curse will kill you if you let the same colored curse stack twice or let it last for 1 minute. You must get hit with different color attacks in order to constantly change the color of the curse.
Tip Watch the aura that appears around Travan as it launches the curse attack to predict its color. Move to the zone that has a different color than the curse you have.

Akalath Kashir's Core Pattern

Akalath Kashir castsSharp Etching every 30 seconds and causes bleeding (stacks up to 5 times).
At max 5 stacks, the debuff develops into Wild Vigor, an irremovable debuff that causes even greater damage. You must remove Sharp Etching as often as you can.

(In the Practice dungeon, this debuff's damage is weak enough to be dealt with just with potions instead of constant removal.)

You have been affected by theCrimson Curse.
You will die if it stacks again.
Move to the blue zone during Travan's next curse attack to change the color of your curse.

You have been affected by theBlue Curse.
You will die if it stacks again.
Move to the red zone during Travan's next curse attack to change the color of your curse.

Currently, you are affected by Wild Vigor and are bleeding.
In the non-practice battle, you should remove this effect as often as you can as it can be deadly if it stacks more than once.

(In the Practice dungeon, this debuff's damage is weak enough to be dealt with just with potions instead of constant removal.)

Dungeon Role Guide (displayed for 20 seconds)

Tank
When encountering a boss quickly approach and use Unwavering orInfuriate to pull aggro. Use skills that decrease the target's endurance and empower DPS characters while maintaining aggro. Use party buff skills when bosses are enraged.

Prime Battle Solutions, Bravery Potions, and Noctenium Infusions are essential items.
Battle Dishes and Noctenium Elixirs will greatly aid your battle.
These items can be purchased from the Training Dungeon Merchant.

Dungeon Role Guide (displayed for 20 seconds)

DPS
Wait for the tank to pull aggro, then use skills that increase your speed and damage and chain your attacks. Save powerful skills with long cooldowns for when bosses are enraged.

Prime Battle Solution, Bravery Potion, and Noctenium Infusion are essential items.
Battle Dishes and Noctenium Elixirs will greatly aid your battle.
These items can be purchased from the Training Dungeon Merchant.

Dungeon Role Guide (displayed for 20 seconds)

Healer
Buff the party before a fight. When your party encounters a boss support your party with endurance decreasing skills. Use purification, heal, or regression when needed. Reapply buffs when bosses are enraged.

Prime Battle Solutions, Bravery Potions, and Noctenium Infusions are essential items.
Battle Dishes and Noctenium Elixirs will greatly aid your battle.
These items can be purchased from the Training Dungeon Merchant.

Hellgrammite's Attack Pattern (Displayed for 30 seconds)

1. AoE Attack + DoT Attack
Hellgrammite, before absorbing nectar, says "Ugh...I can't take it anymore," and launches an AoE attack (knockback).
As the message, "Hellgrammite is absorbing nectar." is displayed, it inflicts periodic damage to all party members.

2. AoE Attack + Poison Discharge
Hellgrammite, having absorbed nectar, says "Ugh...I can't take it anymore," and launches an AoE attack (knockback).
As the message, "Hellgrammite is discharging poison." is displayed, it releases poison to attack the entire area 3 times.
- These attacks leave a stack of Air Pollution upon hit.

3. 4-Directional Attack
Hellgrammite clashes its hands together, and then attacks in all four directions.
- Activated at random intervals
after Hellgrammite's HP drops below 50%
- Attack Sequence: Left hand > Right Foot > Right Hand > Left Foot >
Left Hand > Right Foot > Right Hand > Left Foot

Mini Game (Displayed for 30 seconds)

1. Evade Laser Beam
Jump and change the color of your shield to match the color of the laser beam to advance.
- White laser beams can't be passed through.
- At least 3 players must reach the Stimulant Pump.
(Only 1 player required in the Guide dungeon)

Nighmare Gossamer Regent's Attack Pattern (Displayed for 30 seconds)

1. 10-Minute Time Attack
The 10-minute timer starts when Nighmare Gossamer Regent’s HP falls below 75%.
- When the timer hits 0, Gossamer Regent will say "Do not dare to
defy your fate..." and launches a devastating attack.

2. Clone AttackAs the message,
"You're transfixed by the regent's illusions." is displayed, Nighmare Gossamer Regent summons a clone to cast Stare on multiple targets. ([Nighmare Gossamer Regent] [Clone])
- Activated when Nighmare Gossamer Regent’s HP drops below 80%
- The Stare debuff lasts for 80 seconds,
and triggers a debuff phase every 60 seconds (2 stacks of Stare result in instant death).
- Users with Crystal Addiction leave a crystal where they stand, which explodes after a set time or when hit by close/long-range explosions.

3. DoT + Ground Attack
As the message, "Nighmare Gossamer Regent is absorbing power from the crystal." is displayed, Nighmare Gossamer Regent inflicts periodic damage in a nearby area and attacks where each player is standing.
- Activated if Nighmare Gossamer Regent’s HP falls below 76%

AoE Attack + DoT Attack

Hellgrammite, before absorbing nectar, says "Ugh...I can't take it anymore," and launches an AoE attack (knockback).
As the message, "Hellgrammite is absorbing nectar." is displayed, it inflicts periodic damage to all party members.

AoE Attack + Poison Discharge

Hellgrammite, having absorbed nectar, says "Ugh...I can't take it anymore," and launches an AoE attack (knockback).
As the message, "Hellgrammite is discharging poison." is displayed, it releases poison to attack the entire area 3 times.
- These attacks leave a stack of Air Pollution upon hit.

4-Directional Attack

Hellgrammite clashes its hands together, and then attacks in all four directions.
- Activated at random intervals
after Hellgrammite's HP drops below 50%
- Attack Sequence: Left Hand > Right Foot > Right Hand > Left Foot >
Left Hand > Right Foot > Right Hand > Left Foot

10-minute Time Attack

The 10-minute timer starts when Nighmare Gossamer Regent’s HP falls below 75%.
- When the timer hits 0, Nighmare Gossamer Regent will say "Do not dare to
defy your fate..." and launch a devastating wipe-out attack.

Clone Attack

As the message, "You're transfixed by the regent's illusions." is displayed, Nighmare Gossamer Regent summons a clone to cast the Stare debuff on multiple targets. ([Nighmare Gossamer Regent] [Clone])
- Activated when Nighmare Gossamer Regent’s HP drops below 80%
- The Stare debuff lasts for 80 seconds
and triggers a debuff every 60 seconds (2 stacks of Stare result in instant death).
(Displayed for 30 seconds in the Guide dungeon)
- Users with Crystal Addiction leave a crystal where they stand
which explodes after a set time or when stuck by close/long-range explosions).

Periodic damage + Area Attack

As the message, "Gossamer Regent is absorbing power from the crystal." is displayed, Gossamer Regent inflicts periodic damage to surrounding targets, then attacks where each target stands.
- Activated when Gossamer Regent’s HP falls below 76%

Additional Attack Pattern After Close/Long-range Explosions

Nighmare Gossamer Regent launches additional close/long-range explosion attacks, depending on its current HP.
- Check its wing color to predict the range. (Red means long-range;
otherwise, close-range.)
- If Nighmare Gossamer Regent’s HP falls below 60%, it launches an additional
close/long-range explosion attack.
- While its HP is below 50%, it generates 3 to 5 crystals
and launches an additional close/long-range explosion attack.
- Crystals caught within the explosion will instantly explode,
inflicting damage in the surrounding area.

You have not yet used the essential consumable, Prime Battle Solution. Please use the item to take the upper hand in the battle.

This message will be disabled after 1 minute, or if you use Prime Battle Solution.

Bahaar's Attack Pattern

1. Bahaar's Hand and Hammer (Phases 1 and 2)
- Bahaar attacks differently, depending on the hand he's wielding his hammer with.
- His hammer, when enhanced, creates a high chance of delivering additional blows.

2. Evade attacks while Bahaar is enraged at all costs. (Phases 1 and 2)

3. Attack from within 8 m. (Phases 1 and 2)
- If you're farther away from Bahaar, he launches powerful combo attacks.

Reduce Bahaar's HP to 20% or lower to move on to the next phase.

When you're ready, move to the center and wake up Bahaar from his sleep to start the battle.

Bahaar's Attack Pattern (Phase 2)

Feel my wrath!
- If you reduce a certain amount (1%) of Bahaar's HP, he'll rage out of control and cast his annihilation skill.
- Have your tank block Archdence attacks (a total of 4 times).
- You must use Regression 3 times to stop Bahaar's annihilation skill that he launches after the 4 Archdence attacks.
- If you fail to stop it, he'll resurrect with 100% HP.

In this Training dungeon, Bahaar does not resurrect. There is no 5-minute Time Attack either.

When you're ready, move to the center and start fighting Bahaar.

Summons Frenzied Troops.

Frenzied Troops absorb energy in the outer lava area and return to Bahaar to self-destruct

They're summoned periodically, and more frequently as Bahaar's HP decreases.

They can't be stopped once they reach the lava area, so use Sleep skills to stop them beforehand.

They move more quickly in an actual battle.

Instruction manual for magic stone chain explosion:

1. Explosion of the previous magic stone triggers the explosion of the next magic stone.
2. If the magic stone chain explosion is successful, the ice door is destroyed.
3. If you as hit by one of the exploding magic stones, the wait state for explosions is activated.
4. If you jump before the wait state for explosions is deactivated, you can transfer the explosion to a nearby stone.

Tip: Jump into a gap between magic stones at the right time to chain the explosions.

Use the Level 70 Scroll and open the gear crate contained within. After enchanting the gear using an equipment or enchantment scroll, you can use [Apex] The Two Banquets to continue with the next step. If you want to be teleported to the town, use the Velika Teleport Scroll in your inventory.

Use glyph tokens to obtain all glyphs. At the bottom of the skill tab (K) you can see the recommended glyphs to choose for PvE. Don’t forget to use the <font color='#BFFF00'>Velika Banquet Souvenir</font> in your inventory!
Under Skills (K) –> Advance Skills you can use Skill Advancement and Skill Optimization Books to earn skill advancement for each level!
Right-click Partner: Dopey Cocomin to claim Cocomin as your partner and send him on adventures from the Companion list (Shift+P)!
Equip cards from the Card Collection (Shift+B) and see all collective effects.

Standard Warrior Attacks:

Warriors accumulate Edge and can unleash it in an explosion of action. (Earned from level 18.)

Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Charging Slash - Combative Strike/
Poison Blade - Traverse Cut

Hint: Set the skills as chain skills to carry out the attacks as quickly as possible after the previous skill.

Standard Berserker Attacks:

Some skills require charging up by holding down the button.

Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Thunder Strike/Cyclone - Vampiric Blow


Hint: Charged skills can increase in power at higher skill levels.
Hint: If Thunder Strike and Cyclone are used as chained skills and overcharged, Vampiric Blow will be fully charged. (Available from level 20.)

Standard Archer Attacks:

Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Rain of Arrows - Radiant Arrow - Sequential Fire - Penetrating Arrow

Hint: Rain of Arrows should always be used as soon as the cooldown expires.
Hint: Set the skills as chain skills to carry out the attacks as quickly as possible after the previous skill.

Standard Brawler Attacks:

The skill effect of Counter depends on the number of Punches landed.
(1 hit: stagger; 2 hits: aerial attack; 3 hits: draw enemies closer; 4 hits: knockback)

Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Punch (1-4 times) – Counter - Roundhouse Kick - Jackhammer

Hint: If you perform a perfect defense, 40% of the enemy’s skill damage is reflected.

Standard Gunner Attacks:

Gunners can use Blast between their skills.

Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Arcane Barrage - Arcane Barrage - Blast - Time Bomb - Blast - Scattershot - Rolling Reload - Blast - Scattershot

Hint: If a skill is canceled early by using Blast, the Gunner can use other skills more quickly.
Hint: Use Arcane Barrage again to cause an even bigger explosion.

Standard Sorcerer Attacks:

Sorcerers use supportive skills first before chaining on main skills.

Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Arcane Pulse - Meteor Strike - Nova - Lightning Strike

Standard Slayer Attacks:

With the right series of skills, Slayers can keep up an endless barrage of attacks.

Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Headlong Rush - Knockdown Strike/Heart Thrust - Overhand Strike - Whirlwind - Overhand Strike

Hint: The chained skill Headlong Rush -> Knockdown Strike/Heart Thrust is very fast.

Standard Priest Attacks:

Priests can increase their casting speed by chaining skills together.

Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Zenobia’s Vortex - Metamorphic Blast - Shocking Implosion - Final Reprisal

Hint: You heal allies with Focus Heal and yourself with Heal Thyself.

Standard Valkyrie Attacks:

Valkyries stack runemarks to inflict heavy damage on enemies.

Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Charge - Leaping Slash - Ground Bash - Windslash - Leaping Slash - Dream Slash - Runeburst

Hint: Bloodflower’s cooldown is immediately reset if you dodge an attack.

Standard Ninja Attacks:

Ninjas gather chi to use powerful abilities.
Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Double Cut - Combo Attack - Skyfall - Combo Attack

Hint: Using Combo Attack reduces the cooldown of other skills.

Standard Mystic Attacks:

Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Metamorphic Blast - Metamorphic Smite - Metamorphic Blast - Boomerang Pulse

Hint: Mystics can set up HP/MP healing orbs before the battle begins.

Standard Lancer Attacks:

Lancers have powerful defensive skills and can directly retaliate against enemy attacks with Retribution.

Execute the following in training:
(The Training Dummy on the right is your target.)

Charging Lunge - 3x Combo Attack/Shield Barrage - Spring Attack

Hint: If you use Spring Attack as a chained skill after 3x Combo Attack and Shield Barrage, the casting speed of Spring Attack increases.
Use restorative potions to regenerate health and mana. Use the shortcut to restore your HP.

Nostrums and Bravery Potions increase your combat effectiveness.
Remember to use these potions before important battles!
